item.title: Josh Cramer sworn in as Bradenton’s new chief of police
item.description: Cramer has lived and worked in the Bradenton community for over three decades.

item.title: Bradenton man facing DUI manslaughter charge after crash with motorcycle
item.description: It happened around 10:30 p.m. at the intersection of 59th Street West and 42nd Avenue.

item.title: Museum shows families the role agriculture plays in everyday life
item.description: This free series is geared toward families with pre-K and elementary age children.

item.title: Rescue from burning car in Sarasota captured by body camera footage
item.description: It happened at the split of U.S. 41 and U.S. 301 near downtown.

item.title: Second person charged in fatal Port Charlotte shooting
item.description: Octavion Washington was arrested Tuesday and charged with being a principal in the homicide.

item.title: PAC reports raising $112,000 in June for Gruters’ bid for state CFO post
item.description: Contributions to the Friends of Joe Gruters committee included $50,000 from Duke Energy Corp.

item.title: State grant a ‘good first step’ in rebuilding Anna Maria’s City Pier
item.description: The $1.25 million was included in the state’s $117.4 billion budget.

item.title: Manatee County launches new web tool ahead of trash pickup changes
item.description: Beginning Oct. 6, a new solid waste collection schedule will take effect.

item.title: Seffner high school teacher charged with showing porn to former students
item.description: The material included images of bestiality and child pornography, authorities said.

item.title: First Alert Weather: Slow moving storms today
item.description: Storms could produce good amounts of rain in the late afternoon and evening.
